title: Interactive Automations in Task mode: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'type')
body:
Works as expected in studio. 

Expected is to not throw error in this case. Most likely something with the way task mode is loading the script or interfacing with it.

In task mode throws:

```
app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:256 TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'type')
    at s.get_metadata (app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:110:28810)
    at s.get_new_canvas (app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:110:28636)
    at eval (eval at parse_single_function (app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:256:37467), <anonymous>:4:73)
    at app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:256:37595
    at l.run_event (app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:256:38335)
    at s.create_instance (app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:256:42287)
    at $e (app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:308:11328)
    at _n.run (app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:308:27840)
    at pn (app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:308:25811)
    at Array.<anonymous> (app.f1d70d42ecd5e566682a.js:308:12413)
```

On the box to polygon example

To recreate create a task template with box to polygon example selected in task mode, attempt to use it with watcher enabled
